description:
## Objective
Show a toast "LoggedOut succesfully" when the user logs out

### Description
1. Go to Dasboard activity and find the function showLoagoutDialog
2. After the line finish() add a Toast with content "Logged Out Succesfully"

####References
https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/notifiers/toasts

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos-mobile-cn).
name: Mifos Mobile CN app: Add Toast Message for Logout
